room_title: Escape room "Mafia Mayhem" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: I took five boys, aged 9-13 to Escape Reality last night along with two other adults. This was our first experience with escape rooms, and we all had a lot of fun! We did Mafia Mayhem. It was very clever and kept everyone engaged. The staff was very helpful! We will be back! Can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Mayhem" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: I have an addiction to escape games. This was our first time here and we did the Mafia Mayhem room. It was fantastic. The room itself was immersive and challenging. There were plenty of fun mechanisms, not just keys and combos. Oh. And you find booze. Bonus!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Mayhem" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: We had a great time in the Mafia Mayhem room. Staff was very accommodating to our large group. Very helpful as this was our first time doing an escape room. Price was VERY reasonable. Will definitely be coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Mayhem" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: Mafia Mayhem was fantastic. Great attention to detail and staff was very helpful. We look forward to returning for Descent into Madness!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Mayhem" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: This was our first time doing one of these and it we got to try the newest room "Mafia Mayhem Speakeasy" and it was a blast. All the staff were very accommodating and so much fun. Mike was awesome. We will definitely be going back again.
